sentences.en: Boxing is a test of skill and technique, rather than brute strength.
sentences.cn: 拳击考验的是技能和技术，不是蛮力。

sentences.en: He pioneered the surgical technique called frontal lobotomy.
sentences.cn: 他首创了被称为额叶切断术的外科手术。

sentences.en: He’s a great player, with brilliant technique.
sentences.cn: 他是个伟大的球员，球技十分精湛。

sentences.en: Her self-confidence will develop alongside her technique.
sentences.cn: 随着她的技术不断提高，她会愈发自信。

sentences.en: In mathematics, we use many techniques of problem-solving.
sentences.cn: 在数学中，我们会使用多种方法解题。

sentences.en: It might be possible to extend the technique to other crop plants.
sentences.cn: 也许可以将这种技术应用于其他农作物。

sentences.en: It was a technique later dignified by the term "info-tainment".
sentences.cn: 那种技术后来被美其名曰“资讯娱乐”。

sentences.en: Scientists are becoming increasingly unsure of the validity of this technique.
sentences.cn: 科学家们越来越拿不准这一技术是否正当合法。

sentences.en: The artist was revolutionary in both subject matter and technique.
sentences.cn: 这位画家在内容和手法两方面都有重大创新。

sentences.en: The earliest operations employing this technique were fraught with dangers.
sentences.cn: 最早使用这种技术的手术充满了危险。

sentences.en: The new technique has been used to identify the sex of foetuses.
sentences.cn: 这一新技术已经被用来鉴别胎儿的性别。

sentences.en: The technique consists of injecting healthy cells into the weakened muscles.
sentences.cn: 该技术是把健康细胞注射到衰弱的肌肉里面。

sentences.en: The technique has been to mutate the genes by irradiation or chemicals.
sentences.cn: 该技术是通过放射线照射或者使用化学方法使基因变异。

sentences.en: There are various techniques for dealing with industrial pollution.
sentences.cn: 处理工业污染有很多不同的技术。

sentences.en: This technique brings life to instruction and eases assimilation of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这一方法给教学带来了活力，也使知识的吸收变得容易了。

sentences.en: This technique is becoming more refined and more acceptable all the time.
sentences.cn: 这种技术变得越来越完善，越来越受人欢迎。

sentences.en: This technique will help people mentally organize information.
sentences.cn: 这项技术将帮助人们在脑子里组织信息。

sentences.en: Use this technique to control your level of arousal.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法来控制性兴奋程度。

trans.tran_en: a special way of doing something
